CustomField.description: Check this box to execute the automatic invoice import logic. Schedulable apex class still needs to be active and scheduled. Uncheck this box to STOP executing the automatic invoice import logic, even though the schedulable apex class is active and scheduled.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box to execute the automatic invoice import logic. Schedulable apex class still needs to be active and scheduled. Uncheck this box to STOP executing the automatic invoice import logic, even though the schedulable apex class is active and scheduled.
CustomField.label: Automation Enabled
